analysis.description:
JUST.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol#205-210) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol#206-207)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of JUST.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol#172) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of JUST.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol#124) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of JUST.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x3dddcf24a8cfbc603a213e772ef07f4f44270ba5.sol#124-125) is not in mixedCase
